examples.example: 我通过自己的努力工作，终于攒够了十万元，这让我非常有成就感。

translate.english: I finally saved up one hundred thousand yuan through my own hard work, which made me feel a great sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 我打算用这十万元去实现自己一直以来的梦想，开启一段精彩的旅程。

translate.english: I plan to use this one hundred thousand yuan to realize my long-cherished dream and start a wonderful journey.

examples.example: 我用辛勤工作攒下的十万元给父母买了一份贴心的礼物，他们特别开心。

translate.english: I used the 100,000 yuan saved from hard work to buy a considerate gift for my parents, and they were extremely happy.
